title: FS2004-Visual Germany Project-Updated Full Release (New Seed)
description:
==================================
VisualGermanyProject (1st full release v1.0)
==================================

- High-Quality-Photoscenery for FS2004 -


Features:
========

- coverage for the whole of Germany (more than 350.000kmÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â²)
- largest coherent photoscenery for FS9 ever!
- uses only the finest image material available
- No Maps2BGL used, completely handcrafted and optimized in thousands of working hours
- compatible with all aerosoft-addons

- ~11 GB on Rapidshare, links encrypted to avoid squealing
- download manager with detailed downloading guide included (english and german)
- modular buildup using rar-archives for very quick installation and uninstallation 
- easy-to-use software to manage the scenery ("VGP-Manager")

- all lakes, rivers and ponds declared as water surfaces in Flight Simulator
- complete autogen-tree coverage (seperately installable)
- detailed 90-page handbook (english and german) 
- background information for scenery creators and programmers
- donate what you want, if you like what you get! ;)


Download includes:
===============

- detailed PDF-handbook
- scenery-management software
- download-manager (Cryptload v1.1.0), tutorial included
- encrypted download links for main download
- alternative tree-textures "treegen.zip"
- autogen placement tool "AgenT"


Enjoy and always Happy Landings!
The Developers

==============================================================

Sorry, friends. This are new archives. In the first release Helgoland is missed. This is fixed now.

Please download again.

RAR-PASS: 4all
